text: Christine Winkler is an Austrian para-alpine skier. She represented Austria at the 1980 Winter Paralympics and at the 1984 Winter Paralympics. She competed in three events in 1980 and in three events in 1984. She won a medal in each event; in total she won three gold medals and three silver medals. == Achievements == {| class="wikitable" width=65% style="font-size:90%; text- align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition !!Location !!Position !!Event !!Time |- | rowspan=2 | 1980 | rowspan=2 | 1980 Winter Paralympics | rowspan=2 | Geilo, Norway | bgcolor=silver | 2nd | Women's Slalom 1A | 1:29.56 |- | bgcolor=silver | 2nd | Women's Giant Slalom 1A | 2:48.10 |- | rowspan=4 | 1984 | rowspan=4 | 1984 Winter Paralympics | rowspan=4 | Innsbruck, Austria | bgcolor=silver | 2nd | Women's Slalom LW2 | 1:32.12 |- | bgcolor=gold | 1st | Women's Giant Slalom LW2 | 1:38.57 |- | bgcolor=gold | 1st | Women's Downhill LW2 | 1:17.66 |- | bgcolor=gold | 1st | Women's Alpine Combination LW2 | 0:23.10 |} == See also == * List of Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic alpine skiers of Austria Category:Alpine skiers at the 1980 Winter Paralympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1984 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1984 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Austria Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Austria Category:Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing Category:Austrian female alpine skiers Category:Austrian amputees
title: Christine Winkler
